name: Cosy Quest: a GGJ19 game
description:
This small game has been made during the Global Game Jam 2019.
We wanted to fix all bugs to make the experience great.

The theme was: What Home means to you.
OST: https://soundcloud.com/komasami/sets/cosy-quest

GGJ submission: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/cosy-quest
